snippet: Mr. Cuomo exercised his clemency power for the first time since taking office in 2011, pardoning just three men.
abstract: Editorial accuses New York Gov Andrew Cuomo of miserly caution in exercising his clemency power, noting his decision to pardon first three men since taking office in 2011; contends part of the problem is state's opaque and unpredictable clemency process.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cuomo exercised his clemency power for the first time since taking office in 2011, pardoning just three men.
